short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you find more information about the github repository shown in your browser now

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension help you learn more about a github repository when you browse one on your browser. It gives you a comparison of the watch count, star count and fork count with other repositories. You can also subscribe the repository for news and comments from some open source community. Besides, the extension shows the language distribution of the repository. We also predict the possibility of getting hot of this repository.
